DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Paraffin Embedding Tissue Processor Device Component Model Name Medical Device Manufacturer Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the name of the tissue embedding center used in paraffin embedding.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Paraffin Embedding Tissue Processor Device Component Model Name
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The infiltrating of tissue specimens with paraffin, as a supporting substance, to prepare for sectioning with a microtome._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._A device designed for preparing or treating a material; also the part of a computer that makes most of the calculations._A style or design of an item._The words or language units by which a thing is known._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Biospecimen Paraffin Embedding Tissue Processor Device Component
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:The infiltrating of tissue specimens with paraffin, as a supporting substance, to prepare for sectioning with a microtome.:An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:A device designed for preparing or treating a material; also the part of a computer that makes most of the calculations.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
The infiltrating of tissue specimens with paraffin, as a supporting substance, to prepare for sectioning with a microtome.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
A device designed for preparing or treating a material.

Property.preferredDefinition: A style or design of an item.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: A style or design of an item.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the model number of a medical device.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A language unit by which a person or thing is known.

Concepts.definition: A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.

ValueDomain.origin: ADEERS:NCI/CTEP Adverse Event Expedited Report System
